question: Which country's ancient cave paintings are "Nsangwini Rock Art"?
explanation: Nsangwini Rock Art is located in the Nkomati Valley between Maguga Dam and Peggs Peak which preserve Eswatini's best bushman paintings. It is Eswatini's one of the most impressive cultural attractions. This rock art could be anything from 400 to 4000 years old. The rock art was the work of the san and pre-dates colonial times.
